QuestData.Title: Rendezvous
QuestData.Description: There is much to be done before this nightmare can end, but we need to regroup before we draw more attention from the Legion.$B$BI managed to retain a signal crystal during the crash used to call transport beacons from the Xenedar.$B$BWith luck, we should be able to use it to establish a link between here and your forces as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Signal Crystal to call down a Lightforged Beacon from the Vindicaar.
QuestData.RewardText: Lothraxion is an old friend, and a noble warrior. We are fortunate to have him among us.
